channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 经济低迷挥之不去，中国房地产投资信托基金跌至历史新低
item.description: China's real estate investment products are tumbling, extending last year's slump as investors lose hope for a recovery in the economy and property assets such as industrial parks and logistics hubs.翻译:由于投资者对经济以及工业园区和物流中心等房地产资产复苏失去希望，中国的房地产投资产品正在暴跌，延续了去年的低迷状态。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Vidya Ranganathan

item.title: 台湾即将投票，市场将面临波动
item.description: Investors are bracing for a volatile reception to Taiwan's election on Jan. 13, with added focus on the island's chip sector, after China said the poll was a choice between peace and war.翻译:在中国表示选举是和平与战争之间的选择之后，投资者正准备迎接 1 月 13 日台湾选举的不稳定反应，并进一步关注台湾的芯片行业。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 美国称向菲律宾运送燃料已与当局协调
item.description: The U.S. embassy in Manila confirmed on Thursday that the U.S. delivered fuel from one of its naval bases in Hawaii to a facility inside a former U.S. base in the Philippines in coordination with the government.翻译:美国驻马尼拉大使馆周四证实，美国与政府协调，从夏威夷的一个海军基地向菲律宾前美国基地内的一处设施运送了燃料。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲股市先于美国CPI上涨，日经指数突破35,000点
item.description: Asian stocks rose on Thursday ahead of U.S. inflation data that could influence the Federal Reserve's thinking on rate cuts, while the crypto world got a boost after exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to track bitcoin were approved in the United States.翻译:亚洲股市周四上涨，美国通胀数据可能会影响美联储降息的想法，而追踪比特币的交易所交易基金（ETF）在美国获得批准后，加密货币世界也得到提振。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 慧与首席执行官预计 140 亿美元的瞻博网络交易不会在中国受到挑战
item.description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Chief Executive Antonio Neri told Reuters he does not foresee any major regulatory risks in China for his firm's $14 billion bid to acquire Juniper Networks .翻译:惠普企业 (HPE) 首席执行官 Antonio Neri 告诉路透社，他预计该公司以 140 亿美元收购瞻博网络的出价不会在中国面临任何重大监管风险。
item.author: Stephen Nellis

item.title: 日元走势落后，美元等待美国消费者物价指数 (CPI)
item.description: The yen was squeezed on Thursday, weighed by sluggish Japanese wages, while the dollar was becalmed as traders waited on U.S. inflation data to see whether bets on rate cuts were justified.翻译:日元周四因日本工资低迷而受到挤压，而美元则表现平静，因为交易员等待美国通胀数据，看看降息的押注是否合理。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 中国警告台湾执政党总统候选人危险
item.description: China on Thursday said it hopes the majority of Taiwanese "make the right choice" ahead of pivotal elections, warning of the "extreme danger" of Taiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te in triggering cross-strait conflict.翻译:中国周四表示，希望大多数台湾人在关键选举前“做出正确选择”，并警告台湾执政党总统候选人赖清德引发两岸冲突的“极端危险”。
item.author: Ryan Woo, James Pomfret

item.title: 中国警告巴布亚新几内亚公民在暴力事件中加强预防
item.description: The Chinese embassy in Papua New Guinea issued a notice on Thursday reminding Chinese citizens and organizations in the country to strengthen security precautions as a wave of riots, vandalism and looting hits the capital.翻译:中国驻巴布亚新几内亚使馆周四发布通知，提醒在巴新几内亚中国公民和组织加强安全防范，防止首都发生骚乱、破坏和抢劫浪潮。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本女海军陆战队正在进行战争训练
item.description: Hikari Maruyama, Runa Kurosawa and Sawaka Nakano are part of an elite force: Japan's Amphibious Rapid Deployment Brigade (ARDB), meant to lead assaults from the sea in a possible future war.翻译:丸山光、黑泽留奈和中野泽香是一支精锐部队的成员：日本两栖快速部署旅（ARDB），旨在在未来可能发生的战争中领导海上攻击。
item.author: Tim Kelly

item.title: 2023 年全球电动汽车销量增长 31% - Rho Motion
item.description: Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles (PHEVs) rose 31% in 2023, down from 60% growth in 2022, according to market research firm Rho Motion.翻译:根据市场研究公司 Rho Motion 的数据，2023 年全电动和插电式混合动力汽车 (PHEV) 的全球销量将增长 31%，低于 2022 年的 60% 增幅。
item.author: Nick Carey

item.title: 美国敦促中国不要干预台湾选举
item.description: The United States, in a clear signal to China, opposes any outside interference or influence in Taiwan's upcoming presidential and parliamentary elections, a senior Biden administration official said on Wednesday.翻译:拜登政府一名高级官员周三表示，美国反对对台湾即将举行的总统和议会选举进行任何外部干预或影响，向中国发出明确信号。
item.author: Trevor Hunnicutt, Michael Martina

item.title: 美国和中国官员讨论包括芬太尼在内的执法问题
item.description: Senior U.S. and Chinese officials, in a virtual meeting on Wednesday, discussed cooperating on law enforcement issues including the illicit flow of synthetic drugs such as fentanyl, the U.S. Department Of Homeland Security said.翻译:美国国土安全部表示，美国和中国高级官员在周三的一次虚拟会议上讨论了执法问题上的合作，包括芬太尼等合成毒品的非法流动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘买盘：日本日经指数的反弹并非一闪而过
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国国务院同意向澳大利亚出售战斧武器系统
item.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the possible sale of Tomahawk weapons system support services and related equipment to Australia for $250 million, U.S. Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Wednesday.翻译:美国国防安全合作局周三表示，美国国务院已批准以 2.5 亿美元的价格向澳大利亚出售战斧武器系统支持服务及相关设备。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 焦点：在 CES 上，传统汽车制造商竞相跟上人工智能军备竞赛
item.description: As artificial intelligence becomes the new horsepower for car buyers, established automakers are redoubling efforts to match the digital features that set Tesla , BYD and other new rivals apart, industry executives and analysts said at the CES technology show in Las Vegas.翻译:行业高管和分析师在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 技术展上表示，随着人工智能成为汽车购买者的新动力，老牌汽车制造商正在加倍努力，以匹配使特斯拉、比亚迪和其他新竞争对手脱颖而出的数字功能。
item.author: Abhirup Roy, Joseph White

item.title: 耶伦表示特朗普的关税计划将增加美国消费者的成本
item.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Wednesday said Republican former President Donald Trump's plan to raise tariffs 10% across the board would raise costs for U.S. consumers, although the United States needs some tariffs and is reviewing those linked to China.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周三表示，共和党前总统唐纳德·特朗普全面提高关税10%的计划将增加美国消费者的成本，尽管美国需要一些关税，并且正在审查与中国有关的关税。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 数十名美国议员支持支持台湾民主的决议
item.description: Dozens of U.S. lawmakers co-sponsored legislation on Wednesday praising democracy in Taiwan ahead of its presidential and parliamentary elections, prompting China to call for the U.S. to stop official contact with the island.翻译:周三，数十名美国议员共同发起立法，赞扬台湾总统和议会选举前的民主，促使中国呼吁美国停止与台湾的官方接触。
item.author: Michael Martina, Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总统称该国正与贩毒团伙交战
item.description: The government has said the latest wave of violence is a reaction to President Noboa's plan to build new high-security prisons for gang leaders.翻译:政府表示，最新一波暴力事件是对总统诺博亚计划为帮派头目建造新的高度安全的监狱的反应。
item.author: Alexandra Valencia

item.title: 习近平向艾奥瓦州老朋友表示世界需要中美关系稳定
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping, in a recent reply to a letter from an Iowa native whom he first met nearly four decades ago, said the world's future demanded stability in Sino-U.S. ties, according to Chinese state media on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，中国国家主席习近平最近在回信一位爱荷华州人的来信中表示，世界的未来需要中美关系的稳定。他与爱荷华州人在近四十年前首次会面。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 台湾事实上的驻美大使会见美国众议院议长，中国激怒
item.description: Taiwan's de facto ambassador to the United States met on Tuesday with U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Mike Johnson, Taiwan's foreign ministry said on Wednesday, drawing a stern rebuke from Beijing.翻译:台湾外交部周三表示，台湾事实上的驻美国大使周二会见了美国众议院议长迈克·约翰逊，此举遭到北京方面的严厉谴责。
item.author: Reuters
